title: Universal Product Codes (UPCs) and International Article Numbers (EANs)
description: When selling a product, most retail distributors want a unique barcode that identifies your product. The choice between a [UPC and an EAN is largely one of where you and/or your distributors are located]. Both are managed by the same organization, [GS1. Unique UPCs/EANs are needed for each product you sell, and different sizes and colors of the same product require unique UPCs/EANs. As such, the number needed can add up quickly.

frontMatter.title: Universal Product Codes (UPCs) and International Article Numbers (EANs)
